name: pixelfed
description: Pixelfed is a federated photo-sharing platform similar to Instagram. It supports albums, Stories, ActivityPub federation, and focuses on privacy and decentralization.
features: Photo sharing: Upload and share photos with followers in a timeline feed similar to Instagram.
ActivityPub federation: Connect with users on other federated platforms like Mastodon and Pleroma.
Stories feature: Share temporary photo and video stories that disappear after 24 hours.
Albums and collections: Organize photos into albums for better content management and presentation.
Privacy controls: Set post visibility to public, followers-only, or unlisted for granular content control.
Filters and editing: Apply filters and basic edits to photos before posting directly in the interface.
Hashtag discovery: Find and follow hashtags to discover content and connect with communities.
Direct messaging: Send private messages to other users with photo and text support.
Mobile apps: Access Pixelfed from iOS and Android devices with native mobile applications.
Import from Instagram: Migrate your Instagram content and followers to your self-hosted instance.
Moderation tools: Manage content with reporting, blocking, and instance-level moderation features.
Custom domains: Host your instance on your own domain for complete branding control.
